text: Once upon a time, in a codebase far, far away...
It was the night before Christmas 2025, and all through the repo...
Not a single pipeline was failingâ€”Copilot had fixed them, you know.
Pull requests were hung by the pipeline with care,
In hopes that the AI agent soon would be there.
The engineers were nestled all snug at their desks,
While visions of MCP tools danced in their heads.
With Copilot reviews done and commit messages read,
They took a quick nap, trusting the agent to fix the thread.
When out on the Slack channel there arose such a clatter,
I sprang from my standing desk to see what was the matter.
Away to the terminal I flew like a flash,
Tore open VS Code, hoping the LLM didn't crash.
The moon on the bytes of the AI-generated code,
Gave the luster of midnight releases about to explode.
When, what to my wondering eyes should appear,
But a GitHub Copilot agent, and eight fresh pull requests, oh dear!
With a little old coding agent, so agile and quick,
I knew in a moment it must be St. Nick... Wait, that's not quite right...
Actually, it was Copilot, wearing a Santa hat!
It whistled, and shouted, 'All workflows are green, how about that!'
It ran all the lints with agentic precision so brave,
Deploying fresh code from GitHub Actions to live.
Happy Holidays 2025 from your AI-powered dev environment!
May your agents be smart and your builds be serene!
~ End of our unusual tale ~
